pitch.cc: Edwin Jackson may prefer to go after Johnny Damon, whose OPS is .741 this season, with the slider rather than facing Miguel Cabrera, whose OPS is 1.053.
That was pitch number 105 for Edwin Jackson; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .274 average in the first 105 pitches but they hit .323 off him after that.
